item.description:
Our next dance is at Anthony's and Spring in the air, it's time to get out and blossom. We'll be dancing, mingling, and listening to great music all night long. FREE SPEED DATING SESSION STARTS AT 8PM, so get there early.â€¦
These monthly dances are averaging over 200 people so come on down and WHO KNOWS???????

Doors open @ 8:00 PM / $7 early bird till 8:30, $10 after
Large Dance Floor / Great DJ & mix of music / Cash Bar / Twist contest
Delicious Hors d'oeuvres / Free coffee

Plenty of Fun Friendly People & Laughs
Anthony's of Malden, 105 Canal St., Malden

Proper dress is required at all dances. No sneakers, jeans, t-shirts, hats, etc.

www.WhatsAngeloDoing.com has some more info too
item.how_to_find_us: Just ask, I'm floating around the room but will have a table with Meet-Up on it, too.
item.name: MAY I have this dance? and try some speed dating too!
